articles.title: Kenya faces challenge in plastic pollution control
articles.summary: The article discusses the efforts and challenges encountered by Kenya in regulating plastic pollution. The government's ban on single-use plastics is highlighted alongside the measures taken by local communities to tackle pollution.

articles.title: Greening the economy in Ghana: SEI supports sustainable e-waste management
articles.summary: This piece uncovers the impact of electronic waste in Ghana and the policies adopted to promote its sustainable management. SEI's role in backing green economy initiatives is also elaborated.

articles.title: Addressing air pollution: New insights from Uganda's rapid urbanization
articles.summary: The report investigates the correlation between Uganda's fast-paced urban growth and the rise in air pollution levels. It examines the urban policies in place and the call for a more integrated approach to urban planning.

articles.title: Air quality and health implications in Nigeria
articles.summary: Focusing on Nigeria, the article brings to light the hazardous effects of poor air quality on health. The need for enhanced air quality control measures and public health advisory is stressed.
